title: RDP fullscreen and redirect keys
author: hoerup
body_snippet:
there's currently no option for setting redirect "key combinations = no" on a fullscreen RDP session.

both mstsc and RDCman2.7 has that option

  - lock fullscreen toggle in tab context menu only when redirect-keys mode is active and session is already fullscreen
  - keep fullscreen toggle available for entering fullscreen (only prevent unstable exit path)
